description: Men's Full-Zip PreCip® Eco Pants in short length—because rain doesn't stop at your shoulders when you're hiking, climbing, or cycling. The waterproof/breathable PFC-free DWR Marmot NanoPro™ recycled nylon ripstop fabric will keep you dry. Full-length side zippers and an elastic waist make it easy to put these lightweight rain pants on and take them off on the fly without removing your shoes. Stash small items in the zippered side and back pockets.
name: Marmot PreCip Eco Full Zip Pants, Short - Mens
